title: Recovering a Friend's email/account
body: My friend, 5putnik0ne, cannot use her email to change her password after being hacked by an "free rp scam", but she still has access (password has not been changed) and she told me to post about it. So if you could look into this, I would appreciate it.

replies.body: Have your friend reach out to our account agents as soon as they can in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). Make sure they pick the option "I need help recovering my account" and once they can verify that they're the original creator, our agents should be able to help him change that email and repair any damage that might have been done!
